titleStmt.title: Apollo staticus. Or, The art of curing fevers by the staticks invented by Dr. Pitcairn, and publish'd by him in Latine: now made English by a well-wisher to the mathematicks.
titleStmt.author: Pitcairn, Archibald, 1652-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J[ames]. W[atson]. and sold at James Wardlaw's shop, opposite to the Locken-buiths,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..

place.placeName: James Wardlaw's shop, opposite to the Locken-buiths
